attributes.action: admit he was wrong and must apologise for the erroneous reasons he provided the UK in making the case for going to war in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace that the Prime Minister has never apologised for acting on what turned out to be erroneous information.  Whether or not he knew this to be the case before going to war is another issue but whatever his knowledge, it was wrong and so he must apologise.

rejection.details: this theme is covered in several other petitions
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
